import random

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
 name: web-app
 namespace: default
spec:
 replicas: 2
 selector:
  matchLabels:
    app: web
 template:
   metadata:
     labels:
       app: web
   spec:
     restartPolicy: Always
     hostAliases:
     - ip: "127.0.0.1"
       hostnames:
       - "foo.local"
     containers:
     - name: cat-hosts
       image: busybox
       command:
       - cat
       args:
       - "/etc/hosts"
